title: Mechanical Contract Engineer – Cape Town
text:
An exciting opportunity has become vacant for an independent and senior Mechanical Engineer to join a small but renowned consulting firm in the Northern Suburbs of Cape Town. The successful incumbent will act as a Contract Engineer on a 1-year renewable contract. This is a flexible opportunity for someone who is close to retirement or who has already retired.

Minimum requirements include:

National Diploma/BTech/BSc in Mechanical Engineering

Over 10 years’ experience in HVAC, Wet Services, and Fire design as well as site supervision, client liaison and overall project management experience

Professional registration with ECSA

Proficiency in AutoCAD, Revit and MS Office

Should you meet the requirements for this position, please email your CV to engineeringrecruitment@rposervices.co.za or contact Riana, Meghan or Dawn on XXX-XXXX. Alternatively visit our website on www.rposervices.co.za

Correspondence will only be conducted with short listed candidates. Should you not hear from us within 3 days, please consider your application unsuccessful.
